content: If you had to sacrifice many things to protect one, you're more likely to give up and throw it away. Including the relationships you have in your hand now. Because it's precious, because you don't want to lose it, you hide it away and put up a front. That's why everyone lies. But... the biggest liar of all... was me.
author: Wataru Watari
source: My Youth Romantic Comedy Is Wrong as I Expected
